Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a wonderful review! We appreciate your company staying with us while visiting Laguna Beach. We hope to have you stay with us in the near future!

Summary: We searched for something nice to celebrate our anniversary away from our home full of people and this beautiful little gem delivered more than we expected! On first site, you don't expect much. The night associate is so awesome. He was very accomodating. He even escorted us to the room!!! Then you open your room door and the amazement is unreal! This hotel has become our favorite spot to get away from reality!!! We are in love with the hotel and our anniversary night was amazing! Thank you 14 West!!!!!ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞

Summary: So I had been road tripping across the US for about two weeks at this point..  from Vancouver Canada to Salt Lake City, to Las Vegas, and then finally into Laguna Beach for some much needed relaxation. We went to check in at 14 west Boutique hotel and were excited to begin this portion of our vacation.  Unfortunately some sort of glitch had changed the double queen room I had reserved into a single king room.  I double checked my email confirmation from the travel site I booked through, and I was not mistaken about reserving the two queens. We spoke with Ryan at the front desk, who did everything he could to find a solution to the problem, but there were no more double queen rooms available at this point.  We both agreed that sharing a king, or one of us sleeping on a couch was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. Ryan will be thrilled to hear he made such an impact on your vacation while visiting Laguna Beach! We hope to have you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: Spent 2 nights here. Great location right across the street from beach access.  Close to the downtown area; very walkable.  Bed comfortable. Enjoyed the fireplace. We had a few issues that were handled well.  Would recommend requesting room towards back to get away from the street noise.  Love being able to use patio area at beach view location; enjoyed a sunset dinner on the patio.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5-star review! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach. We're looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: This location is great near downtown, Ralphs' and beach.  For the price it works especially for young in shape folks. Don't attempt if you have a physical handicap. It was our first trip after hip surgery only to find elevator broke so needed to climb stairs, bathrooms no grab bars, deep tub to step into, no bath mats, broken air conditioning but provided us fans.  Would be fine if those things are not an issue or if you like a nice deep tub.   Windows open only it was loud then as we were near the front and main drag.  Room also had a small step under the bed that we stubbed toes on.  Beds were soft.  We were there for a wedding and sink lighting was not enough to put on make up etc. Door locks were hard to use. It was clean, they were friendly, had parking underneath, kitchen,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. As you mentioned we are centrally located to all main attractions and restaurants including the Ralphs down the street for anything you might need. All our rooms are located on the second floor and we have someone on staff 24/7 ready to help if needed since we do not have an elevator at our property. We hope you are recovering well from your recent surgery and we're looking forward to having the opportunity in having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Wonderful location and Perfect customer service!
Summary: Has a wonderful time visiting with my out of state friend, sitting on our patio sipping wine and watching the waves.  Definitely will be staying again. The location was great, walking distance to all the restaurants and shops.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach. We are centrally located near all the attractions and restaurants. We're looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: The rooms are amazing and the hotel staff go above and beyond they make you feel welcome we couldn't of picked  a better place. The rooms are clean and it is walking distance to all the shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a great review! We appreciate you staying with us and our staff will be thrilled to read your review!

Summary Heading: Terrible service. No attention to detail. Incompetent staff. No professionalism.

Upon checking in, the concierge did mention the last two days of my stay were fully booked and immediately offered me a Villa (sister property of the hotel) for the additional nights I required (obviously at a completely different rate). Manager Response: We are sincerely sorry to hear that you wanted to stay longer with us but unfortunately, we were sold out months in advance for that week. We take pride in the service we provide and hopefully we'll be able to assist you better for any future needs. We'd love to have you as one of our many repeat guests.

Summary Heading: Worst customer service, retaliated against with fraudulent room charges.
Summary: This booking was for my cousin and myself as she lives in California and I flew in from Colorado. Gorgeous, great location. I dropped my bags off, front desk more than accomadating to hold as I had arrived early. I went to the beach, returned at 5pm. To an entirely different experience. New man at front desk named Ryan. Your experience with our staff will not go overlooked and I would love to get in contact with you to further investigate your experience and make it right. Please contact me directly. Summary: Booked this for a 2 night stay based on the great reviews.  We easily found street parking about 2 blocks away. Check in was okay and put in room 12.  The furniture was looking shabby and the air conditioning unit is very loud.  It constantly would turn on and off all night keeping us up.  Had to ask for more towels and housekeeping came past 3:00, while we wanted to get ready for early dinner.  Location was perfect and walkable to many great beaches and resturants.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. As you mentioned, we are centrally located to all main attractions including many restaurants in shops in the area. You can't beat our location with the ocean right across the street. We'll definitely check the AC unit in the mentioned room to make sure it is running correctly as we normally don't hear noise complaints regarding this. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you stay with us again in the future. We have plenty of rooms to choose from, including some ocean view Villas. Give us a call next time your in town!

Summary: We went for the last days of our honeymoon in order to relax and have a beach holiday, They upgraded us for a small amount to a beatiful beach house(the retreat). As a result it was a memorable 2 days for us. We would like to especially thank to Nasrin and Emilly for their hospitality and warm attitude shown to us.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a great review for us! Nasrin and Emily will be thrilled to hear they made your stay with us memorable. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Had a pleasant stay here when I was on business travel in Laguna. Julio at the front desk was very helpful. I needed to switch rooms part way through my stay, and they were able to move my bags for me, and also store luggage before check-in when I arrived from the airport. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you Kristen for taking the time to write such a great review for us! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us during your visit to Laguna Beach. Our staff is always ready to help and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Taking a family trip up the coast and we had 2 nights booked at 14 west.  Upon an early arrival we were told we had an opportunity to upgrade to an oceanfront beach condo.  What an amazing place, right on the ocean with easy access to the beach. Perfect start to the vacation, I highly recommend this property!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We manage multiple properties, some with amazing ocean views like the one you upgraded to. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your vacation while visiting Laguna Beach and hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Stayed for two nights with my wife and two teenagers.  The room had two queen beds and was in a perfect location.  It was super easy to get to both north and south Laguna and the  beach.  Staff was incredibly friendly and helpful.  Parking was so easy which is a big plus in LB.  A+++
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us an A+++! We are centrally to all main attractions in Laguna Beach including Downtown which is only 8 minutes walking distance and the beach right across the street. We're looking forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Found this property by chance.  I booked their last room with a balcony for a quick weekend trip to the coast.  Upon arrival we were offered an ocean side condo in the sleep hallow property.  Top unit, phenomenal views, and quiet surroundings.  The staff was helpful were always available.  We are going back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I'm happy to hear you got to enjoy one of our ocean front Villas during your visit to Laguna Beach. We're looking forward ti having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Faculty treated me nicely and the place itself was lovely!!!!!!!!! I‚Äôm definitely coming back here due to the location and setup of the hotel! Everything you need is near by and you‚Äôll understand how comfy your room is!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I'm happy to head you enjoyed your stay while visiting Laguna Beach.

Summary: 14 West...Great property...rooms are clean and modern...close to everything! Staff and Manager Julio are very friendly  ..easy check and out.. 5 stars ...highly recommend this hotel if you are coming to Laguna and want to be in the heart of it all!!
Manager Response: Thank you Jeff for your review of 14 West. It was a pleasure having you and your wife celebrate such a special event at our property. It was great meeting both of you and I'm looking forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Fantastic location and view-will be coming back!
Summary: I booked a long weekend stay at 14 West and had the opportunity to upgrade to one of the sleepy hollow condo properties on the ocean side.   Could not beat the view and charm of the condo -perfect for one or two people. Beach view, large balcony and clean comfortable furnishings. Very helpful hotel personnel and perfect location.  I will definitely be booking again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a great review! I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your during your visit to Laguna Beach! I hope to have you as our guest again soon!

Summary Heading: Horrible check in and check out times
Summary: The hotel is fine. Comfortable room and good location. Check in is 4 pm and check out is 10 am. I have NEVER seen this anywhere and I have travelled extensively. I cannot understand why a hotel needs 6 hours to clean a room.  I will not go back!
Manager Response: Thank you Yannis for writing a review for us. I'm sorry to hear you did not agree with our check in and out times. We would have been happy to give you an extension if you would have let us know you needed additional time and we are always happy to check in well before 4pm if our rooms are ready. I truly hope you give us another chance to make it up to you. I'd love to have you as our guest again.

Summary: I stayed at W14 recently and was very happy at this hotel . The staff were helpful and pleasant at all times . The walk to downtown is about 10mins and a supermarket is one minute away. While it is on the highway the rooms are quiet and large . My room was number 11 which was nicely appointed with a large bed , separate sitting area , gas fire  , and walk in robe.   I would stay at this hotel again and reccommend it highly . Excellent value for money. Best to not get a room on the highway as it could be noisy . But from #11 I could never hear the traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I hope to have you as our guest in the future and maybe you can try another one of our great rooms!

Summary: Very tasteful and roomy appartment, very practical interior, well equipped kitchenette, nice bathroom, cosy sitting area, and all on a great location by the ocean. Bed is enourmous, (matress could have been a bit firmer but maybe that‚Äôs personal). Laundry facilities available, very friendly staff. All in all very much to be recommended!

Summary Heading: Best hotel in my 25 years of travel
Summary: Let me share my remarkable experience with this hotel....everything was just perfect....from the peoples working the front desk to the maid it was just a wonderful experience. The hotel is just in the middle of the action with the beach across the street and plenty of restaurant and shop to accommodate all your need. The apartment was spectacular with all the comfort that you need to make yourself a wonderful meal. Wi-fi was great....a/c was working fine....and you have access to a washer and dryer. So if you want to stay in a great place with no worry you can book with confidence at this place...i did and enjoy it for my entire week.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful remarks about your experience, from the luxurious unit to our central location. I'm happy we were able to make your trip special. I hope to have you as our guest in the near future!

You are a valuable asset to this hotel!! We will definitely be visiting here again.
Manager Response: Thank you Kim for giving us this great review. We appreciate you staying with us. Robert and the rest of the staff was thrilled to read your review. I hope we see you again in the future!

Summary: We were in room number 2, away from PCH. Room has a fireplace and a kitchenette with everything you could want or need. It also had sky lights in the room and bathroom. The grocery store is around the corner so very convenient and the beach is 1/2 block away. Room includes beach towels.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful 5-star review.

The pictures totally do it justice.   From the beginning I felt like a VIP. The staff was remarkable in answering my email questions. When I arrived I was met by Robert who was exceptional in his service. He made me feel welcome and special at the same time. When you have travelled a long distance warmth and welcoming go a long way to create an exceptional experience.  Robert grinned as he said there might be the opportunity of an upgrade into one of their condo properties nearby the ocean. Summary: This is one of the nicest hotels I have ever stayed in I‚Äôd say! It was so clean and fresh and open. The bed was incredibly comfortable and the room had everything you could need. It was spacious, it even had a walk in robe. I would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay, needs a little bit of love
Summary: I had guests stay at this hotel for my wedding back in 2015. The place was incredible. We decided to book this last June to revisit Laguna Beach. Although the rooms and exterior still look nice, we noticed some things needed repair : cable box with wires hanging loose, hole in the closet, ... and there was no safe for our valuables... We hope it will get some attention in these details with the new management.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed at 14 West Boutique Hotel in Laguna.  Overall we LOVED it!  We love the Melrose Place feel to it with the common area.  Each room is HUGE!  All rooms are decorated differently and all have fireplaces.  Our room had a beautiful bathroom, separate vanity, walk in closet.  The kitchenette was fully stocked with glassware and dishes.  It also had 2 refrigerators.  There is a skylight that stretches from the living space into the bathroom.   A nice touch for natural sunlight.  Each room has a patio area, if you will at the front door.  Very pleasant for enjoying the day.  A quiet and pleasant place.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Brady Bunte - 14 West Hotel, Laguna Beach, CA
Summary: Very cool boutique Hotel!    I really enjoyed my stay here.   It is very conveniently located within walking distance to the beach, shops, restaurants and market!   The staff is very friendly and the hotel has a cool vibe to it.   I highly recommend!  Tell them Brady Bunte sent you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This boutique hotel was perfect for our weekend getaway!  We went to Laguna for the weekend to visit friends in the area.  We have stayed at many other places in Laguna but they were booked due to us visiting on a holiday weekend.  This hotel DID NOT disappoint!  It was clean, spacious, modern, clean, quiet, great room amenities, big bathroom, small kitchenette, clean, close to everything, did I mention clean and quiet?  We will definitely return, thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Small boutique hotel that was very spacious and clean right across from the ocean and not far from the main beach.  Close to the grocery store, Taco bell and restaurants, my family and I enjoyed having the little kitchenette and refrigerator.  The staff was amazing accommodating our friends in their request to stay in the same room during their stay.  Also, the deck provides a great seating area (with warming lamps for those chilly nights) and a grill if you decide to stay in and cook.  The rooms are very modern, the bed and pillows were comfy and a great tv and fireplace-  My family and I come every year and have discovered this great new gem that will now be our place to stay from now on.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a small boutique hotel which makes everyone feel like family the rooms are Immaculate the place is awesome and the staff is even better..... Big Ups to Sergio, Robert and Qiya  and everyone else there that makes this place a definite place that I will come back to visit....thanks all
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that we helped to make your trip extra special. Our staff's goal is to make you feel at home. Thank you for your feedback and we are looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: An awesome hotel across the street from the ocean great beds kitchenette rooms open up to great meeting area with table lounge chairs and barbecue. A perfect meeting place for family members staying at hotel together. We were there for a family wedding and it was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay. It was a pleasure having your wedding group stay with us and I am happy to hear we met your expectations. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great accommodation but beware the traffic noise
Summary: This place has really fine rooms modernly appointed with up to date appliances, bedding and furnishings.  Each room has just a little different set up.  There is a classy outside sitting area between the 2 layers of rooms that run along a rectangular upstairs setting. The hotel is located rough on Pacific Coast Highway 1 and it is LOUD.  My first room was only 1 room removed from the highway and it was not acceptable.  I could only move one more room over, but that was enough to curtail the traffic noise. If you go, request as far back from the highway as possible. Undergound parking is available for %15/ night and worth it as there is only metered parking for 8 am- 7 pm in the neighbourhood.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review us. We hope to see you again on your future travels to Laguna Beach.  Happy Holidays! 14|West hotel

Summary: My husband surprised me by bringing me to Laguna for the first time and booked this beautiful hotel for us! Julio (front desk manager) greeted us and was very kind. The room we were in was beautiful and stylish and it even had a nice kitchenette! The room was a decent size and the bed was comfortable. We were very pleased with our stay and cannot wait to come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a comment and I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate your business‚Äã and hope to see you back soon.

The rooms were stylish and comfortable (with a kitchenette to boot) and you're right across the street from the beach. There's an onsite parking garage ($15/day). My friends and I stayed here the other night, and when we came home after 2:00am we couldn't get into our room (alcohol may or may not have been involved...). Robert, who was working the desk, was so nice and helpful-- even though I'm sure we were so annoying. I can't say enough positive things about him/the hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time to leave us a review. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back soon.

Summary: I selected this hotel by the affordable rate in the area and good star ratings in Trip Advisor. The experience at the hotel exceeds my expectation.  The location is a bit off of the main beach, but it's in front of a free trolly stop and Ralph's is at next block.  The room was impressively well designed and comfortable. We stayed there just one night, but the room is good for longer stay with utensils, gas ovens, gas ranges, a microwave and two fridges at the kitchen and a walk in closet.  Only negative point was there's no elevator and guests need to carry baggages through narrow stairs as all rooms are laid on the 2nd floor.  We arrived there at 11:00am and could park our car at the last parking space available at that time while the check-in time was 3:00pm. The parking

Summary: Hotel was as advertised, very clean and good location right in the heart of the laguna.  Tons of shops and restaurants are easily walkable. Staff was help and parking was among the cheapest we've found at hotels in southern California. Room seemed quiet too.
Manager Response: Dear Vincent,   Thank you for the positive and honest review. Looking forward to your next visit.  Best,  14|West hotel

Summary: As return guests at this boutique hotel we love the 14 West for its convenient location, modern style,  comfort and privacy. Having stayed here previously, it is only fair to say that this unique property has seen better times and is in desperate need of a make-over. We hope the new management finds its way back to the charm this property once had.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we appreciate your business. As you mentioned,14 West is very convenient and every room has a unique feature of its own. We are in process of making changes so please come back and visit us soon.

Summary Heading: Modern Hotel with Many Amenities- Loved it!!
Summary: My husband & I stayed here for the first time for Labor Day Weekend. We drove in from Arizona.  A busy weekend, but from the time we arrived (the young man behind the desk took the time to tell us what was nearby, about the beach access directly across the street, and even helped us with our bags to our room and showed us to our room.   They provide free ice downstairs, which was awesome for packing a cooler for the beach each day.  The room was very spacious, modern, beautifully tiled bathroom with jet tub and a walk-in closet!!!!!  You never see that in a hotel!   The daily housekeeping was a plus, so we got fresh towels and beds made. The kitchen area had everything we needed, including a nice cork screw for a bottle of wine we brought :)   The bed was the most comfortable
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Lovely to hear you had a fabulous time in Laguna Beach and very pleasant stay at 14|West hotel. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again.  Warm regards,  14|West hotel

Summary: Nice rooms (which is almost like a small apartment) with good location, close to shops, restaurants and the beach. It even has a small kitchen! Stylish interior, clean. Nice restaurant tips which we used. Definitely recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Mary,   We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to see you again.  Best,  14|West hotel

Summary Heading: Excellent Boutique Hotel in Heart of Laguna Beach.

We have had two summers to find our home away.  Last night we had overnight at 14 West in Laguna Beach. We will definitly be back.  Sergio at the front desk welcomed us and showed us to our room. What a room with an outdoor terrace and fireplace, lounge furniture, sunroof, funky living room and kitchen.  It has a beach flavor with a contemporary vibe and one of the best showers on the west coast.  It is in the heart of Laguna.  We love Laguna because it keeps the authentic beach town vibe but its not hokey. World class beach across the street, great restaurants.  We love Laguna.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for your kind words and glad to see you have enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Booked this hotel because of the pictures. Came into the lobby to check in and the front desk person, Sergio was eating and talking to me with a full mouth. The lobby smelled like fart. Upon arriving at the room it has a smell of old rust. The room was stuffy and the t.v didn't work! I went to notify the front desk, and he just gave me a blank stare and said he will make a phone call. Really unprofessional and will never come back to this dump! The towels were yellow and stained. Total ripoff
Manager Response: none

Summary: Let me say first off the stuff were very helpful and great during the 3 days we were there.  The hotel is run down but in the pictures looks sparkling! Great to have a fridge though :)The jacuzzi tub was not working but they said they apologized and the jacuzzi outside was working. It was not. The lounge chairs and deck chairs were stained and shabby looking...not at all inviting. The tub to climb into, was about 36 inches high...any disability in this hotel would not work...stairs up to the room were steep and narrow also. There is a BBQ( not the built in one showed on the pictures) that stands outside with no propane rank...maybe
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a wonderful experience at this hotel. Sergio couldn't have been more helpful or sincere at what he does to make his guests feel special and appreciated!! Thank you for that. The room was clean and spacious and the beds were very comfortable. Loved the room rate which was a big factor in choosing where to stay, but it had to be a nice hotel too. But let me say, this was more than nice. Soooo close to the beach and village also. Plenty of utensils and such for the kitchenette, and the AC worked great. Spacious closet and nice bathroom. The outdoor patio was very nice and clean. The maid was super nice too. A big thankyou to all the staff for making our stay very memorable. We will return!!
Manager Response: Hi Kim,   We are happy to hear we were able to make your stay enjoyable. We hope everything is well up in Vegas. Looking forward to seeing you again on your next stay.  Best,  14|West boutique hotel

Manager Response: Hi William,   Thank you for the honest review. From what I can read It sounds like your stay was way too adventurous. We are sorry to hear that our gate was giving you trouble. Summary: 14 west is beautiful hotel !!!  Lots of space in your room . People work there are very friendly! !!! It's close to beach and shopping area.  Rooms are beautiful! !- pato at hotel are beautiful and you can cook out too.it's a beautiful place to stay !!!! Rita
